#summary List of Open9x Features.
#labels Featured

= Features in open9x: =

 * Calculation _*speed optimizations*_
 * Less Flash, Less RAM used
 * _*5 Flight Phases*_ with Fade In/Out and elective self trims. 
 * _*Switches like a Mix Sources*_
 * new source in Mixers and Custom Switches: 3POS (ID0/1/2) which returns -100% / 0 / +100%
 * Simple _*Difference for Ailerons*_
 * _*Trims*_ in mixes  can be used like a _*slider*_ 
 * _*Inverted curves*_ in Mixes and Expos
 * _*DR/Expo*_ with Curve and Flight Phase support
 * _*Timers_* and _*Telemetry_* inputs in _*Custom Switches*_
 * A full featured _*Timer2*_
 * The _*throttle trace*_ in statistics can be dependent on Channels and Pots, not only THR
 * THRt means trigger: the timer starts at _*THR trigger*_ and doesn't stop when THR again at idle
 * It's possible to switch  _*TX Stick Mode*_ without messing everything in mixes
 * Safety switches moved to Function Switches
 * Support for _*Frsky HUB*_ 2.0 sensors
 * Screen with _*Custom Telemetry*_ view with sensors min/max options
 * Screen with _*Telemetry Bars*_
 * _*Threshholds*_ in Telemetry Bars. A1/A2/RSSI threshold is first alarm value, <br>for other telemetry sensors thresholds are set up by Custom Switch and Function Switch combination.
 * _*Virtual channels Screen*_ for showing Channels 9-16 and Virtual Switches
 * _*Speaker Mode/Lenght*_ separated
 * Selectable _*Haptic*_ modes 
 * Open9x is prepared for _*translations*_ in several languages (done for en, fr, se)
 * Switchig _*Lower/Uper case characters in Model Name*_ with LEFT/RIGHT press
 * Select Model with LONG MENU (not EXIT) 
 * Copy Model with MENU press 
 * Move Model with DOUBLE MENU press 

*[http://open9x.googlecode.com/files/open9x%20manual%20francais.pdf French User Guide Download]*
